General.Name: Beaconsmind AG
General.Description: beaconsmind AG offers technology and software solutions for location-based marketing in the areas of retail in Switzerland and internationally. The company provides beaconsmind suite, a software-as-a-service (SaaS) solution with a modular setup that allows customers different levels of data collection and analysis, and implementation of push-notification based marketing. Its solutions enable retail customers to run location-based marketing campaigns in physical stores. The company also provides services to integrate customers' mobile app and POS systems with the beaconsmind suite; and Bluetooth Beacons hardware and onsite installation, content creation and management, data intelligence and reporting, and consulting and support services, as well as custom software programming, and general advisory services related to digitised marketing. It serves shopping malls, supermarkets, hotels, restaurants, and gyms. The company was founded in 2015 and is headquartered in Stäfa, Switzerland.
